summary.para: Gets an instance of associated with the provided file identifier.

param.name: fileId
param.para: The identifier for the relevant file.

param.name: propertyHandler
param.para: An instance associated with the file specified by fileId.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is used to convert a file identifier to a local file system path. That path is then used to provide the propertyHandler to the local file.

summary.para: Gets an instance of associated with the provided path.

param.name: path
param.para: The path for the relevant file.

param.name: propertyHandler
param.para: An instance associated with the file specified by path.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets an instance of associated with the provided URI.

param.name: uri
param.para: The URI for the relevant file.

param.name: propertyHandler
param.para: An instance associated with the file specified by uri.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is used to convert a remote URI to a local file system path. That path is then used to provide the propertyHandler to the local file.
